name: Giant Ox
languages: understands Giant and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.
